item.description:
"There was a cabaret, and there was a Master-of-Ceremonies and there was a city called Berlin in a country called Germany. It was the end of the world . . . and I was dancing with Sally Bowles and we were both asleep. . . . " â€” Cliff in Cabaret

Take your seat at the Kit Kat Klub, the perfectly marvelous cabaret where singer Sally Bowles meets writer Cliff Bradshaw. As the two pursue a life of pleasure in Weimar Berlin, the world outside the Klub begins to splinter. Presiding over it all is singer, songwriter, and former Dresden Doll Amanda Palmer as the Kit Kat Klub's magnetic Emcee, with A.R.T. regulars Remo Airaldi, Thomas Derrah, and Jeremy Geidt.

The American Repertory Theatre in Cambridge has gotten better and better, and I ended up getting season tickets because everything they are doing this year looks fantastic. NOTE: This show is now sold out.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture and plan to be in line at least half an hour early.
item.name: Cabaret at A.R.T. in Cambridge
